item.title: Content Marketing Tactics: How to Create Compelling Content that Drives Traffic to Your Website
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description: Creating compelling content that drives people to your website is essential for increasing traffic and improving SEO. This guide provides tips on how to improve local SEO, enhance user experience, and create engaging content that drives traffic to your website.
item.content:encoded:
One of the major concern for bloggers or website owners is to direct traffic or drive people to their site, and that is by creating compelling contents. Getting noticed on Google and other search engine is essential for businesses and website owners to succeed objectively. With millions of websites and businesses vying for attention, it can be challenging to stand out from the crowd. However, by leveraging the latest trends in search engine optimization (SEO), and creating compelling content businesses and website owners can improve their visibility on Google and attract more customers. These are essential for increasing traffic and improving SEO.

Do you want to attract more potential customers and increase your online visibility? What then are the various ways to improve SEO and increase traffic? This article provides 5 strategies and tips on how to improve local SEO, enhance user experience, and create engaging content that drives traffic to your website.

Understand Your Target Audience And Focus On User Experience

You need to understand your target audience and what kind of content they are looking for. Conducting research and gathering insights on their demographics, interests, and behavior will help in creating relevant and engaging contents. For example, if your site provides fashion tips and trends, you can create content that showcases the latest styles and enables users to create their fashion lookbooks. Creating interactive and fresh content that is engaging and informative will help drive more traffic to your site, retain users, and generate returning visitors.


Google’s algorithms are designed to prioritize websites that provide a good user experience. This means that you will need to focus on creating websites that are easy to navigate, load quickly, and provide high-quality content that caters to your users’ preferences, motivations, and pain points. You will increase user engagement, improve customer satisfaction, improve the click-through rate, conversion rate, ensure the relevance of your site content, and drive more traffic as you improve your search engine ranking and attract more visitors to your site.

Carefully Choose A Suitable Format And Promote Your Contents

Choose a format that suits your brand and your content. Whether it’s blog posts, videos, infographics, or podcasts, it’s important to create a consistent style and voice that resonates with your audience. After that, promote your content through social media, email marketing, and other channels to reach a wider audience.

Use Suitable SEO And Voice Search

When it comes to Google and search engines, SEO is like a magic wand that can make your website appear before the eyes of potential customers. So, you will need to Incorporate SEO best practices to ensure your content is discoverable and ranks well in search engines. This includes using relevant keywords, optimizing headlines and meta descriptions, and internal and external linking.

Additionally, a well-optimized website with high-quality, relevant content is more likely to receive backlinks. Backlinks indicate to search engines that your website is a reliable source of information, thereby increasing its authority. The more authority your website has, the more likely it is to appear higher in search engine rankings.

Have you ever wondered how voice assistants like Siri and Alexa have revolutionized the way we search for information? Voice search is rapidly gaining popularity, and those who optimize their online presence for voice queries can gain a competitive edge. There is a need to incorporate conversational language and long-tail keywords into your website content, you can enhance your chances of appearing in voice search results. For example, instead of targeting a keyword like “best coffee shop,” consider using a more natural and conversational phrase like “Where can I find the best coffee shop near me?” This strategy can help you align with the way people speak when using voice assistants, increasing your chances of getting noticed on Google.

You need to understand how consumers search using voice, so as to create content that drives traffic to your site through voice search. It is important to focus on creating content that is conversational and uses natural language.


Additionally, organizing your content with clear headers and subheaders helps voice assistants to quickly find relevant information and present it to consumers effectively. Providing, accurate, and informative answers that are easy to understand can also enhance your site’s credibility and drive traffic. All these combined will ensure that your site is optimized, attract organic traffic, and rank higher on Google or search engines.

Leverage Local SEO

If your business has a physical location or serves specific geographical areas, local SEO is your secret weapon. We’ll discuss the significance of Google My Business, online directories, customer reviews, and other local SEO tactics that can skyrocket your visibility in local searches.

Optimizing local SEO involves optimizing a website for local search terms, such as “Best bakery shop in New York City” or “Tasty coffee shop in Oklahoma”. Including local keywords in your content and optimizing your Google My Business, Yelp, and Yellow Pages listing, you can improve your blog or website visibility in local search results and attract more customers.


Leveraging local SEO can help in creating content that drives traffic to your site by optimizing your content with location-specific keywords, getting listed on local directories, and managing your online reputation. By targeting location-specific keywords, your content can rank higher in search engine results pages for local searches, thereby increasing the visibility of your content to potential customers. Moreover, by listing your business on local directories such as Google My Business, you can make it easier for local customers to find your business and drive traffic to your site.

Additionally, managing your online reputation can also significantly impact your local SEO efforts. Encouraging and responding to positive reviews and addressing negative reviews in a timely and professional manner can help build trust with your audience and improve your search engine rankings, resulting in increased brand awareness, leads, and sales.

Improve On Video Content and YouTube Optimization

The rise of video consumption is undeniable, with YouTube being the second-largest search engine after Google itself. Integrating video content into your marketing strategy can be a powerful way to engage your audience and boost your online visibility.

You should be able to create high-quality and engaging videos that provide value to your target audience. These could include product demonstrations, tutorials, customer testimonials, or behind-the-scenes glimpses of your business. Be sure to optimize your videos for YouTube SEO by using relevant tags, descriptive titles, and thorough video descriptions. Additionally, consider embedding videos on your website to enrich your web pages and increase the time users spend on your site. The longer visitors stay engaged, the higher your chances of ranking well on Google.

Conclusion

In summary, getting your business noticed more on Google requires a proactive approach and a keen understanding of the latest trends. By leveraging and implementing these 5 strategies – Understand Your Target Audience And Focus On User Experience, Voice search optimization, Leveraging Local SEO and Google My Business, and Improving Video content with YouTube optimization – you can improve your business’s or website’s visibility on Google and attract more potential customers.


Embrace these strategies, adapt accordingly, and stay ahead of the competition. Remember, staying ahead of the curve and adapting to the ever-evolving landscape of online visibility is key. The digital landscape is ever-evolving, so continuously monitor industry updates and consumer behavior to refine your approach. By doing so, you’ll position your business for long-term success in the online universe.

So, let’s embark on this journey together and make your business or website shine brightly in the vast Google universe!


I hope you found these insights helpful! Remember to track your progress and make adjustments as needed. Happy optimizing!

item.title: Update and Agree Or Lose Your Whatsapp – Whatsapp’s New Terms
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description: Unfortunately, it has been noted that WhatsApp running on older Android and iPhone devices will cease to be supported on the latest version of the messaging app, requiring owners to either update their mobile operating system or buy a new compatible mobile device...
item.content:encoded:
Unfortunately, it has been noted that older Android and iPhone devices will cease to support the latest version of the messaging app, requiring owners to either update their mobile operating system or buy a new compatible mobile device. More importantly, any device not running at least Ice Cream Sandwich – Android 4.0.3 or, iPhone not running iOS 9 or newer, will no longer be able to open or operate the Facebook-owned app – Whatsapp.

Android phones or devices that will lose WhatsApp support include the LG Optimus Black, Samsung Galaxy S2 and HTC Desire. This also applies to some of the iphone model devices between iPhone 4S and iOS 9; those that we’re release before iOS 9 but not before iphone 4S.

This, this implies that all iPhone models up to the iPhone 4 model will not be able to support the popular messaging app – WhatsApp, as these phones are not capable of updating to iOS 9 and rendered incompatible. However, owners of iphone 4S to iOS 9 can still update to a compatible operating system if they are yet to do so.

Phone owners will either see an updated Terms and Conditions when opening their WhatsApp messenger with the choice to agree or not, or can see the software update version their device is using by checking the settings section of the device. As for iPhone users, it can be found right under:

 Settings > General >  Software update.

Below are the Phone models will lose WhatsApp support from 1 January, 2021:

1. HTC Desire

2. Apple iPhone 1-4

3. Motorola Droid Razr

4. Samsung Galaxy S2

5. LG Optimus Black

6. Any Android released before 2010

List Of Phones that will need to update to at least iOS9 or Android OS 4.0.3:

iPhone Models;

  • IPhone 4S
  • IPhone 5
  • iPhone 5S
  • iPhone 6
  • iPhone 6S

Android Models;

  • HTC Thunderbolt
  • Motorola Droid 4
  • Samsung Galaxy Note
  • HTC Sensation
  • Samsung Galaxy S3 or newer version
  • LG Lucid
  • Sony Experia Pro or newer


The popular messaging app terms and conditions are already in force, whereby all users must either agree in order to keep using the app or lose access to their messages as well as the app itself.

item.title: Whatsapp New Feature – You Can Now Be Able To Permanently Mute Messages
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description: This feature initially permits users to disallow message notifications from groups and individual contacts for a period of time specifically to suit the user, now allows it without any time limit even for groups...
item.content:encoded:
WhatsApp, The online prominent instant messaging platform, has now made available an updated feature – The mute feature, for all Android users which has been used by a lot of Android users worldwide since its release. This feature initially permits users to disallow message notifications from groups and individual contacts for a period of time specifically to suit the user, now allows it without any time limit.

This means users will not have to periodically revisit their mute decision to update it all the time. Until then, users could only mute notifications for 8 hours, 1 week, or a year in their WhatsApp settings, however, the recently launched option is now ‘Always’ and it is intended to replace the ‘1 year’ option.

The ‘mute notification’ choice can be activated by tapping on the three dots at the top right corner in a chat window which then will allow you to select a duration of your choice. WhatsApp does not notify affected contact or group of this decision when initiated. You should note that muting a group or private chat will not necessarily stop their messages from trooping in, it will only stop notifying you about the messages from the groups or people you have muted.

Aside the general mute feature relating to messages, WhatsApp also enables users to mute their status updates. Muted statuses are usually hidden just below the list of permitted ones, but can be viewed at the user’s will. This mute option is one of WhatsApp’s own way of helping users to create barriers or boundaries on whom ever they decide to interact with or not on the platform and also to avoid unnecessary spams and annoying notifications from these people or groups.

However, the good thing about this is, it is only a modest restraint because the messages from muted contacts can still be found on the list of unread messages. Although a severe measure or action is the ‘block’ feature which is available on most social media platforms to prevent privacy invasion and spams. This avoids any form of dealings with contacts considered as threats but unfortunately, it cannot be used on WhatsApp groups. To compensate for that, the most helpful and effective way of preventing unwanted messages from those groups is to entirely exit the groups, which has been a lot of help to most people regarding invasion.

Apart from this, users can change their privacy settings to allow only known or specific contacts to add them to groups they prefer. As at now, both the mute and block actions can be reversed if the need be. For now, the ‘Always’ mute option has been added to the list of terrific features on the prominent messaging app – Whatsapp.

Meanwhile, aside the ‘mute forever’ feature already existing in Telegram, there is another feature which enables messages or accounts to self-destruct after a period of long idle period of time may also be accommodated on WhatsApp platform in the future.

item.title: Hopefully we might be able to employ others – Winnie Dabi Diamond (CEO – Nectar Juice Gh)
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description: Currently, we work from home at the moment and focused on raising enough capital to be able to cater for certain things and hopefully we might be able to employ others...
item.content:encoded:
Winnie Dabi Diamond and her partner in business, Judith Asampana started a business right after their National Service with the idea whiles studying on campus to build up a business for themselves and then as part of contributing to society, employ others to control the unemployment rate and further boost the business.

The brain behind Nectar Juice Gh

In an interview with the co-founder of Nectar Juice Gh, Ms Dabi Diamond said the business will go a long way to survive and employ others to help control the unemployment rate in the country just as other business owners might help to do the same.
Winnie Dabi Diamond is a young lady who graduated from the University of professional studies, Accra with a BSc. Business Administration (Degree), the co-founder of Nectar Juice Gh.
Her partner in the Nectar juice business is Judith Asampana, a graduate of Lancaster University with a Law degree.

Winnie & Judith

She is Ghanaian from the Volta region but has lived in Accra all her life. She is a very determined person, very goal oriented and really loves to push people to do things they have always wanted to do.

The Journey

She noticed over the years that she’s a very handy person; I mean, I’m really good at doing things with her hands, a visual learner and learnt a lot through that as well as practical means. That is how she realized that she’s a “jack of all trades.”

Over the years she started learning a lot of handy works that could easily bring money to the table. First was makeup, wig making and then making of juices. Along the way, what came up next was a little buying and selling.  Currently, her main focus is on the juice business although she does the others part-time.

Taking Off

The juice business started as a result of her latter days during service as the thought of not being retained at her place of service.

As a result, she started thinking of other means to sustain or support herself right after National Service so she approached a very good friend of hers and pitched in the idea of both of us coming together to bring this dream into reality.

Basically, at Nectar Juice, they produce fresh fruit juices for all occasions; weddings, naming ceremonies, parties, corporate meetings or events and many more. They also sell to individuals and sell at fairs as well.
They look out for the best for our customers in regard to their health. Also, they make sure all their juices a naturally made with no added preservatives or any chemical, giving customers a wide range of flavours and tastes which is 100% natural.
Natural flavours

 

Some of the fruits used for the juices are pineapple, watermelon, mango, guava with a mixture of some vegetables such as beetroot, carrot, dandelion, etc.
Recently, they have started with the service of providing locally Ghanaian drinks such as Bissap juice (sobolo), Asana, Lamugin and palm wine to their menu.
Satisfying customer demands
For an “exotic feel,” they also provide fruit punches, alcoholic punches and alcoholic cocktails to their menu.

The Plan

When asked about their plans for Nectar Juice Gh, she explained, “Currently, we work from home at Ashaley Botwe-New town and at the moment we are focused on raising enough capital to be able to cater for certain things and hopefully we might be able to employ others.”
